name: UpdateAssetType
description:
Update an existing asset type in Freshservice.

Use this tool to update information about an existing asset type within the Freshservice platform. The asset type to be updated is identified by its asset_type_id.

parameters.name: asset_type_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the asset type to be updated.

parameters.name: asset_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the asset type to be updated.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the asset type

parameters.name: asset_type_name
parameters.description: The new name for the asset type to be updated.

parameters.name: asset_type_description_html
parameters.description: Provide a short HTML-formatted description of the asset type.

value_schema.description: Short description of the asset type in HTML format

parameters.name: plain_text_description
parameters.description: Provide a short plain text description of the asset type. Avoid using HTML or special formatting.

value_schema.description: Short description of the asset type in plain text format

parameters.name: parent_asset_type_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the parent asset type to establish hierarchy.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the parent asset type

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the asset type

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the asset type

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Short description of the asset type in HTML format

value_schema.description: Short description of the asset type in HTML format

parameters.name: description_text
parameters.description: Short description of the asset type in plain text format

value_schema.description: Short description of the asset type in plain text format

parameters.name: parent_asset_type_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the parent asset type

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the parent asset type
